data.title: Blueprint Product Roadmap
data.description:
Strategic roadmap for the Blueprint SaaS platform development.
This roadmap defines epics, features, user stories, and AI-executable tasks
in a hierarchical structure optimized for both human planning and AI execution.

epics.name: Create Prototype
epics.description:
Create a very early prototype to:
1. prove the value of such Context Management Tool
2. Share the product with Mentors

epics.name: Educational Content Layer
epics.description: Educational Content is very important in product acquisition funnel. We want Blueprint to support its development supported by AI (just like we do primarily for software development itself)

features.name: Tripwire Product
features.description: For now the idea is written down as .md file. But we want all such important things to be defined as DSL so it is well structured, we can visualize and modify it

features.name: Subdomains
features.description:
1. AI-Generated Business'es Subdomains based on the previous business'es Blueprint Layers analysis
2. Visualize the Layer
3. Enable manual modifications

features.name: Bounded Contexts
features.description:
1. AI-Generated Business'es Bounded Contexts based on the previous business'es Blueprint Layers analysis
2. Visualize the Layer
3. Enable manual modifications

features.name: Contexts Map
features.description:
1. AI-Generated Business'es Contexts Map based on the previous business'es Blueprint Layers analysis
2. Visualize the Layer
3. Enable manual modifications

features.name: Jira Integration
features.description: We want Jira users to easily integrate with their Blueprint (so they can easily synchronize their Jira tickets with the Blueprint Backlog and the other way around)

features.name: Integrate Behavior Driven Development specifications for items in Backlog
features.description: This aims to allow better context management for AI-Agents working on chunk of work from the Backlog

epics.name: Integrate with external analytics systems
epics.description: We want Blueprint layers (e.g. Customers Factory) to be powered with the actual product's analytics data (e.g. what is the actual conversion rate for our landing page) so the AI Agents operating on the business layer (e.g. Roadmap/Backlog) can create informed epic/ticket ideas to improve the metrics for the specified goals

epics.name: Possibility to create custom Blueprint Layers
epics.description: We need plugin architecture to allow for building custom Blueprint Layers
